anya-e0105n5:1_1: Punapi dhammānando ācariyassa bāhusaccaguṇaṁ makkhetukāmo evamāha –
anya-e0105n5:1_2: “tassa (buddhaghosassa) samayantarakovidasaṅkhātaṁ bāhusaccaṁ na tato uttaritaraṁ hoti,
anya-e0105n5:1_3: yaṁ ādhunikānaṁ ganthantarakovidānaṁ sīhaḷikabhikkhūnaṁ yaṁ vā ekādasame kharistavassasatake (1001-1100)
anya-e0105n5:2_2: porāṇā vā ācariyaanuruddha-dhammapālattherādayo samayantarabāhusaccavasena ācariyabuddhaghosena samānā vā uttaritarā vā bhaveyyuṁ,
anya-e0105n5:2_3: te ācariyabuddhaghosattherassa aṭṭhakathāhi anāraddhacittā hutvā tato sundaratarā paripuṇṇatarā ca abhinavaṭṭhakathāyo kareyyuṁ,
anya-e0105n5:2_6: atha kho tesaṁ ekopi na evaṁ vadati “ahaṁ buddhaghosena bāhusaccavasena samasamoti vā uttaritaro”ti vā,
anya-e0105n5:2_7: aññadatthu te ācariyassa aṭṭhakathāyoyeva saṁvaṇṇenti ca upatthambhenti ca,
